name: set_air_shoe
description: If true, puts whether this <%= doc_class_name %> has the effects of `AirShoe`.
Otherwise, removes the effect of `AirShoe` if the <%= doc_class_name %> has it.
While under the effects of `AirShoe`, the <%= doc_class_name %> is able to move over `Broken` <%= type 'Tile' %>s.

parameters.name: has_effect
parameters.desc: `true` if you want this <%= doc_class_name %> to have the `AirShoe` effect. Otherwise `false`.
